scripts.prettier: prettier -c . && yarn workspaces foreach -A -pi run prettier
scripts.prettier:write: prettier -w . && yarn workspaces foreach -A -pi run prettier:write
scripts.prepublish: tar --exclude typechain-types --exclude artifacts --exclude cache  --exclude node_modules --exclude out --exclude .next --exclude build -czf files.tgz .gitignore .yarn .yarnrc.yml apps
